## DiffPick type

From T remove properties that exist in U.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DiffPick<T, U> = Pick<T, Exclude<Keys<T>, Keys<U>>>
```
**References:** [Keys](./types-kit.keys.md)

## Example


```ts
interface Props {
   a: number
   b: number
   c: number
}

// Expect: { b: number, c: number }
type NewProps = DiffPick<Props, { a: number }>
```
